NL4OPT 2022

Tutorial

This tutorial page will through the process to register and submission. It will then give a tutorial on how to set up the baseline of the task.

If you have further questions, we encourage you to refer to the FAQ page and use our forum for discussion.

1. Registration

To register for this competition, head to the Participate page and follow the instructions. Registration will officially open on July 15th, but you may sign up now and be on a mailing list. You may be required to re-register.

2. Submission

Please see our Starter Kit page for detailed instructions. Submissions will be done on the Codabench platform

3. Baseline Tutorial

This will be released on July 15th. Thank you for your interest!

Codabench
